Brownies

GREEK YOGURT PROTEIN BROWNIES

Moist and tangy protein brownies made with Greek yogurt, packing 23g of protein.

23g
Protein
180
Calories
38m
Total Time
12
Yield

Nutrition per 1 brownie

Carbs13g
Fat8g
Fiber3g
Sugar5g
DifficultyEasy

INGREDIENTS

  • 120g chocolate whey protein powder
  • 60g oat flour
  • 45g unsweetened cocoa powder
  • 100g granulated sweetener
  • 1 tsp baking powder
  • 2 large eggs
  • 240g plain Greek yogurt
  • 1 tsp vanilla extract

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Preheat Oven

Preheat oven to 350¬∞F (175¬∞C). Grease an 8x8 inch baking pan.

2

Mix Dry Ingredients

In a large bowl, whisk together the protein powder, oat flour, cocoa powder, sweetener, and baking powder.

3

Mix Wet Ingredients

In a separate bowl, whisk together the eggs, Greek yogurt, and vanilla extract until smooth.

4

Combine

Pour the wet ingredients into the dry and mix until just combined.

5

Bake

Pour the batter into the prepared pan and bake for 25-28 minutes.

6

Cool

Let the brownies cool completely before slicing.

PRO TIPS

üí°

Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 5 days.

üí°

For best results, use a kitchen scale to measure ingredients in grams.

üí°

Let cool completely before storing to prevent sogginess.
